jcolibri.util
Class ProgressBar

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      jcolibri.util.ProgressBar
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class ProgressBar
extends javax.swing.JFrame

Progress bar window that shows methods progress. You should only need init() and step() methods.

Developed at: Robert Gordon University - Aberdeen & Facultad Informática, Universidad Complutense de Madrid (GAIA)

Version:
1.0
Author:
Juan Antonio Recio García
See Also:
Serialized Form
